comment.author: 93792136@N02
comment._content:
Dear Madam / Sir,

I will like to take this opportunity and deeply thank you for accepting the photo invitations in our group! It is a great honor for us to host photos from the San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive's photostream.

Sincerely yours,

Panagiotis A. Pietris
Group Admin

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/93792136@N02] Panagiotis, Thank you for wanting to host them.  Best! Alan, San Diego Air and Space Museum
